DOC.brief_title: CryoCath Freezor CryoAblation Catheter System ( CRYOFACTS )
DOC.detailed_description: Due lack enrollment trial . The FDA Medtronic discuss inclusion data find publish literature ( external study ) corroborate study endpoint . The FDA allow data study close .
DOC.criteria: Some inclusion criterion establish electrophysiologic study ( EPS ) ; thus two group inclusion criterion . For inclusion study subject must fulfill ALL follow criterion : PreEPS inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients clinical history AVNRT refer ablation . 2 . Patients willing provide write informed consent . PostEPS inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients EPSdocumented AVNRT ANY follow regarded criterion exclude subject study : 1 . Patients preexist AV block . 2 . Patients know cryoglobulinemia
